idea-plugin.name: MLoggerAI
idea-plugin.description:
Intercepts Run Configuration logs and proposes AI-driven solutions to help you debug faster.

Features

  • Automatic error detection from console logs
  • AI-powered solution suggestions
  • Support for on-premise and cloud LLM providers

License

This plugin is free for non-commercial use (personal, educational, research).
Commercial use requires a separate license.
Contact: bluethrushlinux@gmail.com
